changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_75"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "COD_ITEM" NVARCHAR(60), "NCM" NVARCHAR(16), "DESCR_COMPL" NVARCHAR(255), "UNID" NVARCHAR(6), "CST_ICMS" NVARCHAR(3), "ALIQ_IPI" DECIMAL(25,6), "ALIQ_ICMS" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_BC_ICMSST" DECIMAL(25,6)) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
